response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its value, I would like to offer it to you for $110. This price reflects its worth while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I believe this is a great opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations.", "product_price": 110}
